component.name: StandardRowListItem
component.script:
sub init() m.itemLabel = m.top.findNode("itemLabel") m.focusIndicator = m.top.findNode("focusIndicator") end sub
sub itemContentChanged() item = m.top.itemContent if item <> invalid m.itemLabel.text = item.title end if end sub
sub onFocusPercentChange() focusPercent = m.top.rowFocusPercent m.focusIndicator.opacity = focusPercent if focusPercent > 0.5 m.itemLabel.font = "font:MediumBoldSystemFont" m.itemLabel.color = "0xFFFFFFFF" else m.itemLabel.font = "font:MediumSystemFont" m.itemLabel.color = "0xEEEEEEFF" end if end sub
